description.value:
Your telepathic sensitivity intensifies when you're affected by mental magic, making it easier for you to link to other creatures. After you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Cast a Spell] with the mental trait, until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 circumstance bonus to Deception, Diplomacy, and Intimidation checks, and to Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Sense Motive].

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feat-effects.Item.Effect: Psychic Rapport]
